mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACTIVITYINFO ( ACT_ID ,ACT_DIV ,ACT_INST ,ACT_START_DT ,ACT_END_DT ,ACT_ROLE ,ACT_CONTENT ,EMAIL ,RESUME_ID
) VALUES ( 'ACT' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24') || '-' || LPAD(ACTIVITYINFO_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 6, '0') ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,#{email} ,#{resumeId} )
